mapper.select: select*from (select*from (select ordernum, productname, sellerid, productnum,orderquantity, userid, username, userphone, orderprice, orderdate, orderstatus,deliverystatus from (select to_char(o.ordernum, '99999999999999') as ordernum, p.productname, p.userid as sellerid, od.productnum, o.userid as userid, o.username, o.userphone, o.orderprice, o.orderdate, od.orderquantity,od.orderstatus,dn.deliverystatus from ordertbl o left join orderdetail od on od.ordernum = o.ordernum left join product p on od.productnum = p.productnum left join discount d on d.productnum = od.productnum left join optiontbl op on op.optionnum = o.optionnum left join delivery de on de.ordernum = o.ordernum left join deliverynow dn on dn.ordernum = o.ordernum where p.userid='${userid}' ) order by ordernum desc ) where rownum<=(${pageNum}*${onePageRecord}) order by ordernum) where rownum<= ${lastPageRecord} ${onePageRecord} order by ordernum desc

select ordernum, productname, sellerid, productnum, userid, username, userphone, deliverymemo, orderprice, orderdate, usedpoint, paymentoption, orderquantity, optionname, optionnum, optionprice, optionstock, orderstatus, saleprice receiver, receiverphone, deliverynum ,deliveryzipcode, deliveryaddr, deliverydetailaddr, deliverycompany, invoice, deliveryprice,deliverystatus, deliverydate, totalsaleprice, realpayment, realtotalpayment from (select to_char(o.ordernum, '99999999999999') as ordernum, p.productname, p.userid as sellerid, od.productnum, o.userid as userid, o.username, o.userphone, o.deliverymemo,o.orderprice, o.orderdate, nvl(o.usedpoint,0) as usedpoint, o.paymentoption, od.orderquantity, op.optionname, op.optionnum, nvl(op.optionprice, 0) as optionprice, op.optionstock, od.orderstatus, nvl(d.saleprice,0) as saleprice, o.receiver, o.receiverphone, o.deliveryzipcode, o.deliveryaddr,o.deliverydetailaddr, to_char(de.deliverynum, '999999999999')as deliverynum, de.deliverycompany, to_char(de.invoice,'9999999999999') as invoice , o.deliveryprice, dn.deliverystatus, dn.deliverydate, to_number(nvl(d.saleprice,0) * nvl(od.orderquantity, 0)) as totalsaleprice, to_number((o.orderprice - nvl(d.saleprice,0))*nvl(od.orderquantity,0) + nvl(op.optionprice, 0) - nvl(o.usedpoint, 0)) as realpayment, to_number((o.orderprice - nvl(d.saleprice,0))*nvl(od.orderquantity,0) + nvl(op.optionprice, 0) - nvl(o.usedpoint, 0) + nvl(o.deliveryprice, 0)) as realtotalpayment from ordertbl o left join orderdetail od on od.ordernum = o.ordernum left join product p on od.productnum = p.productnum left join discount d on d.productnum = od.productnum left join optiontbl op on op.optionnum = o.optionnum left join delivery de on de.ordernum = o.ordernum left join deliverynow dn on dn.ordernum = o.ordernum where o.ordernum = '${param1}') order by ordernum desc
select count(ordernum) totalRecord from orderdetail join product on product.productnum = orderdetail.productnum where product.userid='${userid}'
mapper.update: UPDATE orderdetail SET orderstatus = '${param2}' WHERE ordernum = ${param1}
